name: Spinach-Bacon Casserole
author: Shirley Efting

ingredients.name: c. shredded Provolone or Mozzarella cheese

instructions: Dice bacon; fry and drain. Cook spinach. Beat eggs slightly, then add milk and salt. Stir in spinach, bread crumbs, bacon and half of cheese. Place in 11/2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese over casserole. Bake at 375Â° for 30 to 35 minutes.
